text: Nde mba harigi fhaiŋ ŋgui gumgi gu mbigi, nde vhɨra mba buna guareŋ mbararagi. Mba buna guareŋ, ne buna vhuueŋ ma. Mba buna vhuuen panan, Fhe Bakɨme taagiap nde ndigi. Nde vhɨra Krais khothɨgap, ana nde ndigi, ana phorgim, Fhe Bakɨme, ana fhum wo suaŋgi kameŋ zɨn vov, ana won Ŋina Ŋaarar nde nɨɨŋgiap, anan panan, nden wora mbuigim, nde ana gumgi gu mbigi ma.
